1.content:
It’s around 4am in the middle of the night. Your sleeping soundly in your tiny bed whilst listening to the soft rain whipping against the window giving you calm and relaxing shivers. Suddenly a loud booming noice could be heard coming from downstairs quickly wakening you up from your slumber. It could easily be mistaken for thunder but then you recognized the groans of struggles as your sister tried to remove her drenched boots stomping them against the floor.

“god damn it sis... Can’t you just be come home quite for once you bitch?” Covering your ears whit your pillow you tried to go back to sleep but the loud sounds from downstairs just didn’t seem to stop. Julia seemed to be walking around probably having a midnight snack before bed like she usually does. You sighed considering what to do next.
1.title: The beginning

as you woke upp from what felt like a nightmare you could feel your entire body being stretched to its absolute limit. The pain constantly shooting through you like lightning. You couldn’t feel anything anymore. Everything just went blank as you could feel your life force slowly being dragged out of your body. Suddenly you could hear rapid running but just for a short moment and you could hear a door locking followed by some fiddling whit a belt buckle.

You were scream begging for her to realize that it was you but then you noticed the mirror to the side and saw that you weren’t a human anymore. Befor she was able to realize that you were indeed her panties she had already thrown you into the trash and continued the day like normal whitout ever knowing that she used you.

In a desperate final attempt, you forced your entire arm inside the disgusting log of shit and slowly tried to dig your way through it. The smell got even worse as you broke through towards the core of it forcing its smell down your lungs filling them up whit the smell of your younger sisters shit. This was absolutely humiliating being treated this way...

Finally, you could feel your arm break through the other end of the turd and whit the last remaining strength you managed to pull yourself through the log of shit and ended up on the other side right in front of the asshole

“Y-Yes! I can get out!” You smiled for the first time clawing and trying to open up the asshole. But it didn’t respond... it didn’t let you out.

Meanwhile, Julia felt the familiar pressure in her lower area... she rose from her bed and slowly stumbled towards the bedroom rubbing her eyes still tired. She pulled down her pajama pants and placed her huge ass on the toilet ring pouring out the logs of shit.

As you were banging on the asshole you cried out in pain. “Let me out! Sis please!!!” you looked back at your lower body your legs have been completely digested and your chest had a few holes through it. Your inner organs were on the verge of collapsing. And that’s when it happened. The hole opened and let you through sending you falling towards the cold toilet water. It was the best feeling in the world leaving that hellish place. But you didn’t get much time to celebrate as log after log of shit came falling down surrounding you. It was a miracle that not a single one hit you. You were now laying in the humid bowl surrounded by shit and is slowly sinking into the cold water whit no way to keep your body afloat.

Julia then stood up from the seat and looked down into the bowl. She saw her half-digested sister struggling to stay above water level. She just giggled and blushed softly as she slowly reached for the toilet handle and... Flushed. “Bye bye sis~ see you in hell~” Sending you down towards your doom into the sewers to never be seen again.
122221.title: Try and claw through it!

122222.content:
“There’s no way I could get through that massive shit! I should just wait here and let her... let me out naturally” you shivered uncomfortably by the thought. While you waited you looked around and noticed how extremely damaged your body was. Your legs were completely digested and you were bleeding heavily from your chest “shit she better hurry up...” you sighed resting your head against the wall.

About an hour later you were woken up by something... touching your torso? Opening your eyes you saw that apparently, another turd has been slowly sliding closer and closer. It was absolutely disgusting! Your getting squished between them! You tried to find a way out of it but before you had a chance to do anything the two collided whit each-other crushing what’s remained of your body turning you into a dark red stain in the turd.
122222.title: Stay here and wait for the right opertunity
